data.title: Abacus
data.statement: The abacus consists of a number of rows of movable beads which can be activated by moving them to the right of the abacus, each active bead represent a power of 10 depending on their row, this abacus dimensions are always {{10}} beads × {{9}} rows. Find the float represented in the abacus.

data.outputDescription: Output the float [[x]] represented on the abacus with {{2}} decimal positions

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

The abacus consists of a number of rows of movable beads which can be activated by moving them to the right of the abacus, each active bead represent a power of 10 depending on their row, this abacus dimensions are always 10 beads × 9 rows. Find the float represented in the abacus.
Input
9 lines: the rows of the abacus
Output
Output the float x represented on the abacus with 2 decimal positions
Constraints
0.00 ≤ x ≤ 11111111.10
Example
Input
oooooooooo----
oooooooooo----
oooooooooo----
oooooooooo----
oooooooooo----
ooooo----ooooo
oo----oooooooo
ooooooo----ooo
oooooooo----oo
Output
58.32
